attributes.action: scrap the council tax support scheme
attributes.additional_details:
PLEASE READ..
scrap this council tax support scheme immediately. im on jsa and now find myself having to pay 61.45 a year. with the 1% increase to my jsa I am now only 70p a week better off and this new council tax support scheme is greater than the jsa increase. include all the high energy prices and other necessary bills( tv licence, water rates) aswell as food to live on this is now virtually impossible to survive on. is this government totally mindless . causing poverty to millions of claimants who want to work but cant as there is virtually no jobs in and around my area and if jobs do arise you get nearly 30 going for it. it is damn right disgusting that this government thinks it is possible to live on jsa benefits it was hard before and its is impossible now. I for one will certainly not be voting for the conservatives again UKIP IS GETTING MY VOTE IN THE NEXT ELECTION
